Package com.atakmap.android.hashtags

Class HashtagManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.hashtags.HashtagManager
  • public class HashtagManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Tracks all registered hashtags in the system and provides methods of filtering content by hashtag

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static HashtagManager getInstance()
        The primary method of accessing the hashtag manager
        Returns:
        Hashtag manager instance (instantiated if not already)

      • registerContent

        public void registerContent​(HashtagContent content)
        Register content to this manager The tags associated with this content are pulled from HashtagContent.getHashtags()
        Parameters:
        content - Content to register

      • unregisterContent

        public void unregisterContent​(HashtagContent content)
        Unregister content from the manager When updating tags, this should be called BEFORE setting the new tags
        Parameters:
        content - Content to unregister

      • updateContent

        public void updateContent​(HashtagContent content,
                          java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> newTags)
        Update content with a new set of registered hashtags

        This will automatically read the current (old) hashtags and unregister before registering with the new tags It's up to the caller to set the new tags on the content itself so that later calls to HashtagContent.getHashtags() return them

        Parameters:
        content - Content to register
        newTags - New tags to register

      • findContents

        public java.util.Set<HashtagContent> findContents​(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> tags)
        Find all contents associated with a set of hashtags
        Parameters:
        tags - List of hashtags
        Returns:
        Set of associated contents

      • findContents

        public java.util.Set<HashtagContent> findContents​(java.lang.String tag)

      • getTags

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTags​(HashtagSortMode sortMode)
        Get complete list of registered hashtags
        Parameters:
        sortMode - Method of sorting hashtags
        Returns:
        List of hashtags

        Returns:
